de.ityx.mediatrix.api.server

Interface ISCase

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IControl, ISCommon, ISConnect

    public interface ISCase
extends ISCommon
    see ICCase
    How to use:
    API.getServerAPI().getCaseAPI().store(con, case);

      • canDeleteCase

        boolean canDeleteCase(Connection con,
                    List<Object> param)
                      throws SQLException
        Checks whether the specified case may be deleted.
        Parameters:
        con - the current connection
        param - the parameter
        Returns:
        boolean true if the case, any question or any answer in the case isn't locked by another operator.
        Throws:
        SQLException
        was:
